from pyccl.pyutils import assert_warns
a = 0.8
b = assert_warns(ccl.CCLWarning, ccl.halo_bias, COSMO, m, a)
assert np.all(np.isfinite(b))
assert np.shape(b) == np.shape(m)
pytest.mark.parametrize('m', [100000000000000.0, int(100000000000000.0), [
    100000000000000.0, 1000000000000000.0], np.array([100000000000000.0, 
    1000000000000000.0])])
